item.title: Builds
item.description: All Github Releases Release Download Git Message Conversations - May 05, 2020 [5d28ae9] pulled translations from transifex Conversations - May 03, 2020 [c159bbfc8] play dial sounds on wrong track to make them play in silent mode. fixes #3697 Conversations - May 03, 2020 [2018ae8ba] fixed some r8 warnings Conversations - May 03, 2020 [a3b3b14bf] yet again more wording Conversations - May 03, 2020 [b6d38f8e8] do not call bundles bundles Conversations - May 03, 2020 [3c3f5d8e6] mark missed calls as unread (bold) in overview.
